meanings.definition: Not reacting or responding to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The cat remained unresponsive to the sound of the doorbell.
meanings.sent2: The patient was unresponsive to the doctor's questions.
meanings.sent3: The unresponsive computer screen seemed to be taking a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her unresponsive attitude was like a stone wall, impossible to break through.
meanings.sent5: The unresponsive plant wilted without water, showing no signs of life.

meanings.sent1: His unresponsive face gave nothing away during the poker game.
meanings.sent2: The unresponsive audience sat silently throughout the performance.
meanings.sent3: The unresponsive teddy bear seemed unimpressed by the tea party.
meanings.sent4: The unresponsive sky remained unchanged, devoid of any emotion.
meanings.sent5: Her unresponsive tone made it hard to gauge her true feelings.

meanings.sent1: The unresponsive phone kept ringing without anyone picking up.
meanings.sent2: The unresponsive suspect refused to speak to the police.
meanings.sent3: The unresponsive doorbell seemed to be on strike, not alerting anyone inside.
meanings.sent4: The unresponsive email sat in the outbox, waiting for a reply that never came.
meanings.sent5: The unresponsive teacher ignored the raised hands of the eager students.
